skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Big 'Ead
skillTree.description: Dat runty shaman finks he's da greatest d'ere is. Give 'em da teef... for now.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Release Spiders
skillTree.description: The Spider-God's smallest minions spin webs all over the enemy's supplies.

effects.description:
Enemy reload time reduction: -4%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Howl to the Moon
skillTree.description: Shamans from the Wolf Lands can empower their WAAAGH! with swiftness.

skillTree.name: Vindictive and Cunning
skillTree.description: No one wants to cross a Goblin Shaman.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Ritual Magics
skillTree.description: Get your hands off that!

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabbin'
skillTree.description: The targets of this spell are driven to go right for the 'hurty bitz' or sneak up on opponents at unexpected angles.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Sneaky Stabbin'"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Whispers of Mork
skillTree.description: Oi! I fink I found somethin'.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Mini Shrooms
skillTree.description: Pop a shroom, cast a spell. Pop a shroom...

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -15% for all spells

skillTree.name: Shifty
skillTree.description: I ain't dyin' today.

skillTree.name: Mork's Sabotage
skillTree.description: Mork will sort it.

effects.description:
Ammunition: -2% for artillery units
	(enemy armies in region)

Ammunition: -4% for artillery units
	(enemy armies in region)

Ammunition: -6% for artillery units
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Breath of Gork
skillTree.description: What, where'd you fink da wind came from?

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: -2% for artillery units
	(enemy armies in region)

Reload time reduction: -4% for artillery units
	(enemy armies in region)

Reload time reduction: -6% for artillery units
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Shadow Shaman
skillTree.description: Listen here, yoo's merely adopted the dark; I was born in it, molded by it...

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Squig units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Laboratory
skillTree.description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Bully
backgroundSkills.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bragga
backgroundSkills.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

backgroundSkills.name: Mushroom-Addicted
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -8% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Serial Danca
backgroundSkills.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

effects.description:
Leadership: -5 for enemy Lords and embedded Heroes
	(enemy armies in region)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.name: Tortura
backgroundSkills.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Shroom Growa’
backgroundSkills.description: Da boyz prefer teef, but enjoy some quality ‘shrooms when the mood strikes.

backgroundSkills.name: Shiny Lova’
backgroundSkills.description: Oi, listen up yooz gits. Bring da shiniest bits back to me… or else.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

backgroundSkills.name: Night Gobbo Loon
backgroundSkills.description: I love da dark places. Yoo can ‘ave so much fun with dem stunties in da dark...

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Leadership: +5 during subterranean intercept battles
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bearded Choppas
backgroundSkills.description: It just sorta happened. After a few scraps, da stuntie’s beard-hairs were stickin’ to my choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs

backgroundSkills.name: Beard Connoisseur
backgroundSkills.description: Whoeva’ brings me da best beard after da scrap gets a necklace o’ teef from my personal stash.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 when fighting against Dwarfs
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Choppa Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."

backgroundSkills.name: Stabba Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"
